description: Dermot Molloy leaves the Donegal senior football panel after failing to become a regular starter in the team.
title: Forward Dermot Molloy quits Donegal panel
title_page: Forward Dermot Molloy quits Donegal panel - BBC Sport
maintext:
Dermot Molloy has left the Donegal panel after failing to become a regular starter in the team.
The forward, who made his county debut five years ago, has been used mainly as a substitute and has not started a championship game since 2011.
Molloy's final appearance for Donegal came as a substitute in the McKenna Cup victory over Fermanagh in Ballyshannon earlier this month.
Donegal start their Football League campaign against Derry on Saturday.
